name: Obsurity
description:
Obsurity swept the whole of Ahn'koval. Eternal darkness and pain is all that we have.

Obsurity - Atmospheric action with elements of metroidvania, puzzles and two playable characters.

The story tells about the fate of a knight exile and a young treasure seeker.

One interconnecting tale of suffering and sacrifice.

    Features
  • A ghoulishly atmospheric, yet beautiful pixel art world.
  • Many secrets and puzzles
  • Confused and mysterious plot
  • Two main characters, each with their own unique gameplay styles
  • Each pixel is placed with love!
